revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=PePLink |model=Surf 200BG |revision=(v2.4) |asin= |fcc_date=04/20/2006 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability= |type=access point, CPE |fcc_id=SAN-SURF200BG, SAN-SURF200BG-C5 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Kendin |cpu1_model=KS8695P |cpu1_cspeed=166 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |fla1_num=2 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT48LC16M16A2-75 IT |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5213A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR2112A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-TNC |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.20.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=MSurf000 |oui=00:11:6E |oui_eth=00:11:6E }} {{TagLine|Integrated Home Wi-Fi Access Point}} :[http://site.microcom.us/PePLink_Surf_AP_appnote_integrated_home_WiFi_access_point.pdf Product Brief]
"WINTI03 v2.4" and "PePLink" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/SAN-SURF200BG/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photos-649110 FCC photos].
Per the FCC manual... *There is an FTP server accessible on the device. :Credentials are root:MSurf000 *The sample SSID shown in the manual is '''MySSID'''. :(200mW, 5dBi antenna)
The RAM chip used appears to be a MT48LC16M16A2-75 IT (32MB).
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=28176 ''PePLink Surf 200BG-AP'' on '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[https://www.tapatalk.com/groups/camerahacksfr/peplink-surf-200bg-t6676.html Thread about the device on '''CameraHacks''']
